record.title: MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 3036 AND S. 3044
record.narrative:
MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 3036 AND S. 3044 -- (Senate - May 21, 2008)

[Page: S4559]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, there are two bills at the desk due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will read the titles of the bills for a second time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 3036) to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a program to decrease emissions of greenhouse gases, and for other purposes.
A bill (S. 3044) to provide energy price relief and hold oil companies and other entities accountable for their actions with regard to high energy prices, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings with respect to these bills en bloc.

record.chair: Objection having been heard, the bills will be placed on the calendar under rule XIV.
